Why hello!  If you do not mind my saying so, sir, that hat of yours has seen better days.|***gc_check_item-->NOT::False    String::vromans_hat    Int::1    ***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::Q_MANFRED    String::>5    |
My hat?  It is one of the most finely made specimens of haberdashery one can find outside Waterdeep.
I agree that it is finely made, but I assure you that the fashion for that make of hat has passed.
Nonsense.
[Ignoring Vroman's comment.] If you like, sir, I can remake your hat into something better suited for the day. It will only cost you fifty gold pieces.
[Vroman looks confounded.] I have not been this upset since I found out my brother was dead.|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False String::Q_MANFRED String::<45 |
What do you think, <FirstName>?  Do you think I should invest in an alteration to my hat?

In truth, Vroman, I would prefer it if your hat were a plain and modest skullcap.||***haberdasher_script-->***ga_take_gold-->Int::50    Int::0    ***ga_give_item-->String::vromans_skullcap    Int::1    Int::0    ***gc_check_gold-->NOT::False    Int::50    Int::0    ||
There you are, sir!  The hat has been altered to your friend's specifications.|***ga_fade_from_black-->Float::4    |
Hmm...We will see if this suits me as well as the old design.

I would like it better if it had no brim and was more rounded at the top.||***haberdasher_script-->***ga_take_gold-->Int::50    Int::0    ***ga_give_item-->String::vromans_rounded    Int::1    Int::0    ***gc_check_gold-->NOT::False    Int::50    Int::0    ||
